Griffith - 5 corner special - Otherwise VG - WAAAAYYYY too much red - $55

Chance - 5 corner special - Otherwise NM - $80

McGraw Finger In Air - 5 corner special - Otherwise VG/EX(mk) - $45

McGraw Portrait - Trimmed - SOLD

Willis - 5 corner special - otherwise EX/MT - $45

Shad Barry - 5 corner special - no name - name written in pencil on side - $20

Killian - a normal T206!! - $24

O'Brien - Massive T206 super large top border likely top of sheet - $30

Please add $3 for shipping.

PM to reserve.

Tom C
